metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39331 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: Nexcloud desktop is the Desktop sync client for Nextcloud. An attacker caninject arbitrary HyperText Markup Language into the Desktop Clientapplication in the notifications. It is recommended that the NextcloudDesktop client is upgraded to 3.6.1. There are no known workarounds forthis issue.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
